overview: A Modernist â€“ a film about the life and times of legendary clothing retailer John Simons.  Featuring exclusive interviews with musicians Kevin Rowland, Suggs and Paul Weller, broadcaster Robert Elms, art expert Ronnie Archer Morgan, advertising guru Sir John Hegarty and Sir Paul Smith as well as John Simons himself.  Plus those who have loved John and his work for over 60 years.
title: John Simons: A Modernist
